summary: This is the twelfth post in the Fastmail Advent 2024 series.  The previous post was Dec 11: Meet the team—Marc.  The next post is Dec 13: It’s knot DNS...
title: Dec 12: Following the Sun

summary: A financial firm registered in Canada has emerged as the payment processor for dozens of Russian cryptocurrency exchanges and websites hawking cybercrime services aimed at Russian-speaking customers, new research finds.  Meanwhile, an investigation into the Vancouver street address used by this company shows it is home to dozens of foreign currency dealers, money transfer businesses, and cryptocurrency exchanges -- none of which are physically located there
title: How Cryptocurrency Turns to Cash in Russian Banks
